channel.title: Comments on: Oh boy, this match is going to be fun.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: Right_Control_Button
item.dc:creator: Right_Control_Button
item.description: Guaranteed marshals with tec 9 and em2

item.title: By: bearvsshaan

item.description: that's what you get for having maga as a clan tag. fuck trumpists
item.content:encoded: that’s what you get for having maga as a clan tag. fuck trumpists

item.title: By: RebbecaOP
item.dc:creator: RebbecaOP
item.description: Hey man! Way to play the game mode the way it’s intended! Cant even capture the hime flag, literally takes 2 seconds if the whole team is on it, not impressed at all
item.content:encoded: Hey man! Way to play the game mode the way it’s intended! Cant even capture the hime flag, literally takes 2 seconds if the whole team is on it, not impressed at all

item.title: By: DaRk_LeGeNd13
item.dc:creator: DaRk_LeGeNd13
item.description: Bro. I remember when that happened to me. It was either I was on a team full of prestiges 11-21, or it was the enemy team.
item.content:encoded: Bro. I remember when that happened to me. It was either I was on a team full of prestiges 11-21, or it was the enemy team.
